snippet.title: TRI - Trailer - Magical Monk Update
snippet.description:
A new version of TRI is available from October, 1st at 
http://tri-game.com

Win/Mac/Linux

TRI is finished and can now be bought on http://www.tri-game.com/buy.html
or via Steam http://www.ratking.de/r/?t=tristeam

TRI is a first-person game with environmental puzzles. You create magical triangles to solve puzzles and reach hidden places in temple-like structures.

The notorious God of Foxes broke out of his magical prison. It is your task to recapture Him with your power as the TRI Keeper.
Find a way through the towers and dungeons in the mystical parallel world of the Ancient Temples. Solve puzzles, climb vertiginous abysses and try not to lose your mind when you're falling upside-down. Don't worry - the TRIs will let you create your own paths in this world! 

Features:
   * freeform 3D platformer
   * trains spatial thinking!
   * (in this video) ~75% done - currently 12 levels
   * build triangles to overcome abysses, reach unknown places, and walk on the walls   
     and the ceiling
   * control light rays and destroy obstacles with dangerous lasers

Music by Ludwig Hanisch: https://ludwig-hanisch.de
